scripts._changelog:
replace-in-file --isRegex true '/^# Landmarks ChangeLog
/' '' CHANGELOG.md && conventional-changelog --infile CHANGELOG.md --same-file -p angular --config scripts/conventional-changelog-writer-opts.js && replace-in-file --isRegex true '/^# /g' '## ' CHANGELOG.md && replace-in-file --isRegex true '/


/g' '

' CHANGELOG.md && replace-in-file --isRegex true '/


/g' '

' CHANGELOG.md && replace-in-file --isRegex true '/


/g' '

' CHANGELOG.md && replace-in-file --isRegex true '/^/' '# Landmarks ChangeLog

' CHANGELOG.md
scripts.build:all: npm run clean:all && npm run _build -- all
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean:chrome && npm run _build -- chrome
scripts.build:chrome:test: npm run clean:chrome && npm run _build -- chrome test
scripts.build:edge: npm run clean:edge && npm run _build -- edge
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && npm run _build -- firefox
scripts.build:opera: npm run clean:opera && npm run _build -- opera
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:firefox && npm run clean:chrome && npm run clean:opera && npm run clean:edge
scripts.test: npm run test:landmarks && npm run test:contrast
